channel.title: Comments on: Singletrack Today – Project Intro

item.title: By: Thomas Coffey
item.dc:creator: Thomas Coffey
item.description: Thanks for the feedback and compliment! Sorry for the delay in replying - the comment notification email I got went to my spam folder. Site is new and I'm still working out the bugs so not surprised you found one. I tried looking in IE but I couldn't find anything overlapping. Do you recall elements were overlapping? If so, please let me know. Thank you!
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the feedback and compliment! Sorry for the delay in replying – the comment notification email I got went to my spam folder. Site is new and I’m still working out the bugs so not surprised you found one. I tried looking in IE but I couldn’t find anything overlapping. Do you recall elements were overlapping? If so, please let me know. Thank you!

item.title: By: new
item.dc:creator: new
item.description: Howdy, I do believe your website could possibly be having browser compatibility problems. When I look at your site in Safari, it looks fine however, when opening in Internet Explorer, it has some overlapping issues. I simply wanted to provide you with a quick heads up! Apart from that, fantastic site!
item.content:encoded:
Howdy, I do believe your website could possibly be having browser compatibility problems.
When I look at your site in Safari, it looks fine however,
when opening in Internet Explorer, it has some overlapping issues.
I simply wanted to provide you with a quick heads up! Apart
from that, fantastic site!
